Title: Authorizes public welfare officials to withhold rent from a landlord when real estate taxes for the rental property are unpaid
Summary: Authorizes public welfare officials to withhold rent from a landlord when real estate taxes for the rental property are unpaid.
LawCode: Amd ยง143-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authorizing public welfare officials to withhold rent from a landlord when real estate taxes for the rental property are unpaid
